title: Please ban
body:
_name removed_ and _name removed_  for boosting.

_name removed_  (nami) intentionally fed middle so that _name removed_  (annie) was able to win her Plat 1 promo that was on 2 wins/2 losses.
Both players are now on Diamond 5 with 0lp. 

These people should not be allowed to receive their ranked rewards because they cheated.

As you can see the game finished in 10 minutes but I was unable to report them as my client crashed.

replies.body:
Instead of reporting on the boards (and getting yourself in trouble because it is against [the rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)), please send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with details of what happened. 

Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you, so be patient. Also, please keep in mind that Riot can not tell you if the players receive a punishment, nor go into detail about their potential punishments due to privacy reasons, but rest assured that they will look into it. 

In the future (if your client doesn't crash on you), please ensure to keep utilising the end of game report feature, as it is the most efficient and effective way to report players ♥
